alert.note: Alert for Coastal Galveston; Galveston Island (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Galveston County through 600 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scholes Field, or near Galveston Causeway, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Galveston Causeway, Galveston Island West End, Hitchcock, Jamaica Beach, Tiki Island, Galveston State Park, Galveston Pleasure Pier, Schlitterbahn, Scholes Field, Moody Gardens, Offatts Bayou and The Strand. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
